Package com.terturl.MMO.Framework

Class InventoryButton

java.lang.Object
com.terturl.MMO.Framework.InventoryButton
public abstract class InventoryButton extends Object
Helper class to create a button that can be used within an InventoryUI
Since:
0.25.0
Author:
Sean Rahman
